mainText: From my first Apple 2C in 1981 to my IPad 2 I purchased this year I have felt like a part of this company. Apple has always been so real to me and Steve seemed so reachable, dressing in blue jeans like I do. I will always be an Apple customer and I am sure that the innovations and dreams of Steve Jobs will be carried on forever.  I'll miss you Steve RIP.
author: Steve
